languages.text: {n}Бледное лицо озаряет слабая заинтересованная улыбка.{/n} "Проткни ей легкие. Они медленно наполнятся кровью, тело будет гореть... Это будет долгий, мучительный конец. Очень хорошая смерть для нелюди".

{n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."
languages.original_text: {n}Бледное лицо озаряет слабая заинтересованная улыбка.{/n} "Проткни ей легкие. Они медленно наполнятся кровью, тело будет гореть... Это будет долгий, мучительный конец. Очень хорошая смерть для нелюди".

languages.text: {n}Una sonrisa un tanto curiosa aparece en los labios de Kibellah.{/n} «Perfore sus pulmones. Deje que se llenen de sangre y haga arder su cuerpo... Es una muerte larga y dolorosa. Ideal para escoria inhumana».
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sonrisa un tanto curiosa aparece en los labios de Kibellah.{/n} «Perfore sus pulmones. Deje que se llenen de sangre y haga arder su cuerpo... Es una muerte larga y dolorosa. Ideal para escoria inhumana».

languages.text: {n}キベラは唇にかすかな笑みが浮かべた。{/n} 「肺に穴をあけろ。肺をゆっくりと血で満たし、彼女の体を燃やすのだ…。長く、耐え難い死だ。非人間的な汚物にふさわしい最期だ」
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは唇にかすかな笑みが浮かべた。{/n} 「肺に穴をあけろ。肺をゆっくりと血で満たし、彼女の体を燃やすのだ…。長く、耐え難い死だ。非人間的な汚物にふさわしい最期だ」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈嘴角露出一丝好奇的微笑。{/n}“刺穿她的肺部，让她的肺慢慢充血，让她的身体燃烧起来……这样的死亡过程既漫长、又极其痛苦，最适合这种邪恶的异形。”
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈嘴角露出一丝好奇的微笑。{/n}“刺穿她的肺部，让她的肺慢慢充血，让她的身体燃烧起来……这样的死亡过程既漫长、又极其痛苦，最适合这种邪恶的异形。”

languages.text: {n}Ein versteckt neugieriges Lächeln erscheint auf Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Durchbohrt ihre Lungen. Sie sollen sich langsam mit Blut füllen und ihren Körper brennen lassen ... Ein langsamer, qualvoller Tod. Ein passendes Ende für nicht-menschlichen Schutz."
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein versteckt neugieriges Lächeln erscheint auf Kibellahs Lippen.{/n} "Durchbohrt ihre Lungen. Sie sollen sich langsam mit Blut füllen und ihren Körper brennen lassen ... Ein langsamer, qualvoller Tod. Ein passendes Ende für nicht-menschlichen Schutz."

languages.text: {n}Un sourire mâtiné de curiosité se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Perforez-lui les poumons. Qu'ils se remplissent peu à peu de sang et qu'elle sente la brûlure cuisante de l'asphyxie... C'est une mort lente et atrocement douloureuse. Une fin digne d'une pourriture non-humaine. »
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire mâtiné de curiosité se dessine sur les lèvres de Kibellah.{/n} « Perforez-lui les poumons. Qu'ils se remplissent peu à peu de sang et qu'elle sente la brûlure cuisante de l'asphyxie... C'est une mort lente et atrocement douloureuse. Une fin digne d'une pourriture non-humaine. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın dudaklarında güç bela anlaşılan meraklı bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Ciğerlerini del. Yavaşça kanla dolup tüm bedenini kavursun... Uzun ve eziyetli bir ölüm olacak. İnsan dışı bir pisliğe yakışan bir son."
languages.original_text: {n}A faintly curious smile appears on Kibellah's lips.{/n} "Puncture her lungs. Let them slowly fill with blood and make her body burn... It is a long, excruciating death. A fitting end for inhuman filth."
